title: Middle East Crisis: Hamas Leader Mourned in Qatar With Middle East on Edge
content: Mourners were gathering for the funeral of Ismail Haniyeh, the political leader of Hamas who was assassinated earlier this week. President Biden expressed deep concern about the situation in the region, and called on Israel to agree to a cease-fire in Gaza.

title: Behind the Prisoner Swap: Spies, a Killer, Secret Messages and Unseen Diplomacy

title: Winzar Kakiouea Is a One-Man Team From Nauru. His Olympics Might be Over in 10 Seconds.

title: Many of Gaza’s Medical Workers Have Been Detained or Killed
content: Out of a prewar total of about 20,000 health workers, 500 have been killed in the war, according to the W.H.O., and more than 300 are in Israeli detention, Gaza’s health ministry says.
